p: It is evident that the emission properties of the solid solutions are mainly affected by the nature of polar order: ferroelectric, relaxor or paraelectric. The evolution of the PL spectra with temperature and polar order can be better quantified by plotting the first temperature derivative (D 14) of the 5D 0 → 7F 1/ 5D 0 → 7F 4 integrated intensities ratio (Figs 4 and S6).
